org.youscope.addon.microscopeaccess

Interface PropertyInternal

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FloatPropertyInternal, IntegerPropertyInternal, ReadOnlyPropertyInternal, SelectablePropertyInternal, StringPropertyInternal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertyImpl

    public interface PropertyInternal
    Represents a property of a device.
    Author:
    langmo

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      boolean isPreInitialization
      Gets the value of the property preInitializationProperty.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDeviceID()
      Returns the name of the device where this property belongs to.
      java.lang.String getPropertyID()
      Returns the name of the device property.
      PropertyType getType()
      Returns the type of this device property.
      java.lang.String getValue()
      Returns the current value of the device property as a string.
      boolean isEditable()
      Returns true if property is editable and false if not.
      boolean isPreInitializationProperty()
      Gets the value of the property preInitializationProperty.
      void setValue(java.lang.String value, int accessID)
      Sets the current value of the property.

    • Property Detail

        boolean isPreInitializationProperty
        Gets the value of the property preInitializationProperty.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceID

        java.lang.String getDeviceID()
        Returns the name of the device where this property belongs to.
        Returns:
        Name of device.

      • getPropertyID

        java.lang.String getPropertyID()
        Returns the name of the device property.
        Returns:
        Name of property.

      • getType

        PropertyType getType()
        Returns the type of this device property.
        Returns:
        Type of property.

      • getValue

        java.lang.String getValue()
                   throws MicroscopeException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns the current value of the device property as a string.
        Returns:
        Value of property.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setValue

        void setValue(java.lang.String value,
              int accessID)
       throws MicroscopeException,
              MicroscopeLockedException,
              java.lang.InterruptedException,
              DeviceException
        Sets the current value of the property. Throws a device exception if the value is not valid (i.e. if the property is an integer property and the value is not an integer), or if the property is not editable.
        Parameters:
        value - Value to set the property to.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeException
        MicroscopeLockedException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        DeviceException - Thrown if value does not correspond to property type.

      • isEditable

        boolean isEditable()
        Returns true if property is editable and false if not.
        Returns:
        True if editable, otherwise false.

      • isPreInitializationProperty

        boolean isPreInitializationProperty()
        Gets the value of the property preInitializationProperty.
